reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.reviews: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She really knows how to break down complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.reviews: Brilliant professor! His passion for coding is contagious. Challenging but rewarding classes.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.reviews: Interesting material, but sometimes the pace is too fast. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.reviews: Prof. Taylor brings history to life with his storytelling. Assignments can be tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.reviews: Best chemistry professor I've had. Clear explanations and fun lab experiments.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.reviews: Lectures are confusing and he goes too fast. Textbook is essential for understanding.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.reviews: Dr. Brown's analysis of classic literature is insightful. Be prepared for lots of reading.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts. Homework is challenging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject and incorporates current events. Field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.reviews: Thought-provoking lectures and discussions. Prof. Moore really makes you question your assumptions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.reviews: Interesting course content but lectures can be dry. Group projects are hit or miss.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.reviews: Explains complex economic theories in relatable ways. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about art and it shows in her teaching. Museum visits are a great addition to the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.reviews: Seems biased in his lectures. Grading can be inconsistent and unclear.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.reviews: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lectures. Challenging but extremely rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.reviews: Makes music theory accessible even for non-musicians. Patient and encouraging.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.reviews: Fascinating subject matter but the workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.reviews: Great real-world examples and case studies. Group projects are actually useful.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.reviews: Dr. Sanchez's enthusiasm for language is infectious. Challenging but incredibly interesting course.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.reviews: Solid understanding of the subject but can be unapproachable. Lab work is the best part of the course.
